  • 所有类
 

所有类

  • 所有类 接口概要 类概要 枚举概要 
    类 说明
    Answer
    an answer is calculated by our system, which contains start/end station, total time and total distance of a riding
    AvoidPlusStation
    policy: avoid plus station: like minimal walking distance but return station cannot be a “plus” station
    Bicycle
    abstract class Bicycle contains 2 concrete classes: Ebike and Mbike.
    BikeVisitable
    Bike visitable of visitor pattern
    Card
    build Card to get different kinds of calculation for users.
    CardType
    three kinds of card
    CardVisitor
    visitor pattern to calculate cost of each riding for different card and duration
    CLUI
    ClUI with basic useful orders.
    CurrentDistribution
    this class hold station distribution in current time, in order that we can easily get station availability
    CurrentDistributionTest  
    EBike
    electric bicycle
    EBikeTest  
    FastPathToDestination
    policy: fast path to destination: the pickup station is chosen so that the combined walk+ride delay to the destination point d is minimal whereas the return station is chosen so that the walking distance to destination point d is minimal
    FastPathToDestinationTest  
    GPS
    location for users and stations
    Map
    A map regroups all the stations.
    MapTest  
    MBike
    mechanic bike
    MBikeTest  
    MinWalDis
    policy: minimal walking distance:the pickup and return stations are chosen so that the /* total walking distance of the trip
    MostUsedComparator
    comparator: with it we can sort stations to list the most used station on the top.
    NoCardVisitor
    to calculate cost of a riding with no card
    Observable
    observable for end stations' condition so that users can be notified
    ObservableStation
    concrete observable station to implement concrete methods
    Observer
    observer pattern to notify users of availability of endStation
    OngoingRide
    generate a "half riding" with only starting information
    OngoingRideTest  
    PlanningAlgo
    different policies to calculate and return answers of requests
    PreferPlusStation
    Policy: prefer plus station: with this policy the return station should be a “plus” station (given a “plus” station no further away than 10% of the distance of the closest station to the destination location exists).
    PreservationOfUniformity
    with this policy the choice of the source and destination station is affected by the number of available bikes (at source station) and free slots (at destination).
    Record
    a record can be easily noted by system
    Request
    a request sent by a user with its location, bike type preference, policy preference and send time so that our system can respond to him an answer
    Ride
    a ride is a whole order which can be easily collected and recorded by system
    Server
    This class models the behavior of a real server, which is to handle the rent and the return(restore) of the bikes.
    Slot
    slot in station, holding a bike or not
    Solution
    a solution is corresponding to a request with all necessary information
    Station
    Station holds several slots where users can rend bikes.
    StationTest  
    UseCase
    Rental of a bike 1. a user (card holder or not) rent a bike of a given type from a given station at a given moment in time 2. the user returns the bike to another station after a given duration (expressed in minutes). 3. the user get charged for the corresponding amount (possibly 0) and possibly receive a time-credit (possibly 0)
    UseCase1
    simulate that a user apply for solutions with different policies, then accept this solution, and shut down the end station finally try to return back bike to this station.
    User
    a user can hold a card and rent bike.
    UserTest  
    VlibreCard
    Vlibre Card, a kind of card
    VlibreCardVisitor
    to calculate cost of a riding with vlibre card
    VmaxCard
    Vmax Card, a kind of card
    VmaxCardVisitor
    to calculate cost of a riding with Vmax card
